. It is considered the Apple Capital of Georgia.
By Car: take Interstate 575/515 off Interstate 75 from Atlanta.
Ellijay has a quaint downtown area with various speciality and antique shops and restaurants but the shopping centers and all the chain restaurants are on the highway.

value: Fort Mountain state park is about 20 min away from Downtown Ellijay on Hwy 52 West
Apple Orchards, mostly located on "Apple Alley" A.K.A. Hwy 52 East
Amicalola Falls is about 20 min away away from Downtown Ellijay on Hwy 52 East
Burt Pumpkin Farm, located just before Amicalola Falls on Hwy 52 East
Hillcrest Orchards, located on Hyw 52 East about 10 mins from Downtown.
Buy some apples at apple orchards in Apple Alley

River Street Grill in Downtown Ellijay

There aren't many bars in Ellijay due to a very religious population.

value: Located in East Eliijay, less than 10 minutes from downtown Ellijay and less than five from the Wal-Mart shopping center.
take Highway 575 South, Best Western will be on your right above the Ford dealership.

take Highway 575 North, Best Western will be on the first and second roads on the left after the Wal-Mart shopping center. The hotel offers wonderful mountain views and a friendly staff of locals. Be sure to pet the hotel cats.
Rainbow Cabin Rentals of North Georgia
riverfront cabin rentals in the North Georgia mountains with direct access to trout fishing, canoeing, and tubing. Make reservations online.
Beautiful vacation homes available for rental in all areas of Gilmer county. Fully equipped kitchens, hot tubs, fireplaces, and many with pool tables.  Some are pet friendly. 800-871-8422 ext. 1.
TLC Cabin Rentals in the North Georgia Mountains

A cabin rental and management company based on the Golden Rule with a personal touch. Several beautiful cabins that can accommodate as many as 20 people. Ideal for business retreats, club gatherings, or family vacations and reunions. 706.636.1979 • 770.827.4922 (866.403-3973 outside of Georgia)
TGIF Cabins located in Historic Downtown Ellijay
Featuring cabin and luxury cabin rentals. Near state and federal parks. Where everyday is Friday. 1-877- 967-2226
Vacation log cabins in Ellijay Georgia featuring whitewater riverfront cabins with premier trout fishing and riverfront hot tubs near hiking, tubing, apple orchards, Amicalola Falls, rafting, tubing.
